whyClientsChoose.name: Why Clients Choose Korn Ferry
whyClientsChoose.description: This category explores the key reasons clients choose Korn Ferry, focusing on positive factors, competitive advantages, and selection criteria.

themes.label: Trusted Relationships and Continuity
themes.description: Clients value long-standing relationships with Korn Ferry consultants, which foster trust and continuity across engagements.

supportingQuotes.text: I tend to go to Korn Ferry because I actually like the people... they know me, I haven't got to be on my best behaviour when I talk.
supportingQuotes.interviewId: Paul Lester, Hudson Advisors UK Ltd.

supportingQuotes.text: Anywhere Chris went, I would go.

interviewIds: Paul Lester, Hudson Advisors UK Ltd.
Dr. Jan Stefan Scheld, Boehringer Ingelheim

themes.label: High-Quality Candidate Pools
themes.description: Korn Ferry consistently delivers strong, well-filtered candidate pools that meet client expectations for quality and alignment.

supportingQuotes.text: They absolutely understood the brief, really fully targeted exactly the right people, put a great long list together.
In terms of the number of... the quality and the quantity of candidates, did they meet your expectations? – Yes, absolutely.

interviewIds: Duffield Ashmead IV, Wadsworth Atheneum Museum of Art

themes.label: Expertise and Market Knowledge
themes.description: Clients appreciate Korn Ferry's deep industry expertise and understanding of market dynamics, which enhance their search processes.

supportingQuotes.text: They know the business, they know our industry, they know what they're doing.
They knew our business, they knew the nuts and bolts of our business, and they also understood the culture that we had.

interviewIds: Dr. Jan Stefan Scheld, Boehringer Ingelheim

themes.label: Responsive and Proactive Communication
themes.description: Korn Ferry is praised for its responsive, proactive communication style, ensuring clients feel informed and supported throughout the process.

supportingQuotes.text: They were incredibly responsive.
supportingQuotes.interviewId: Gary Knell, San Diego Zoo Wildlife Alliance

supportingQuotes.text: We had one scheduled weekly call throughout the process... and they were always available for other queries, more ad hoc stuff.

interviewIds: Gary Knell, San Diego Zoo Wildlife Alliance

themes.label: Structured and Efficient Processes
themes.description: Clients value Korn Ferry's structured, efficient processes that ensure timely and effective search outcomes.

supportingQuotes.text: Everything went very fast, the finding of the candidates in both roles.
It was one of the most seamless processes I've ever been through.

interviewIds: Dr. Jan Stefan Scheld, Boehringer Ingelheim

promoterExperience.name: The Promoter Experience
promoterExperience.description: Key themes that characterize what promoters value most about working with Korn Ferry, focusing on exceptional experiences and strong satisfaction.

themes.label: Trusted Relationships and Continuity
themes.description: Promoters value long-standing, trusted relationships with Korn Ferry consultants, which foster confidence and satisfaction.

supportingQuotes.text: I trust him with my business...Anywhere Chris went, I would go.
I knew the boss, I knew the consultant that I wanted to work with, because I have a deep trust in [Danny]'s... human touch.

interviewIds: Lew Little, Giving Home Health Care

themes.label: High-Quality Candidate Delivery
themes.description: Promoters appreciate the high caliber and alignment of candidates provided by Korn Ferry, which often exceed expectations.

supportingQuotes.text: It was an impressive slate...I ended up with this great person that I never would have uncovered.
In terms of the number of... the quality and the quantity of candidates, did they meet your expectations? – Yes, absolutely.

themes.label: Responsive and Proactive Communication
themes.description: Promoters value Korn Ferry's consistent, proactive communication and responsiveness throughout the engagement.

supportingQuotes.text: They were incredibly responsive.
supportingQuotes.interviewId: Gary Knell, San Diego Zoo Wildlife Alliance

supportingQuotes.text: We had one scheduled weekly call throughout the process... and they were always available for other queries, more ad hoc stuff.

interviewIds: Gary Knell, San Diego Zoo Wildlife Alliance

themes.label: Expertise and Market Knowledge
themes.description: Promoters highlight Korn Ferry's deep expertise and understanding of the market as key differentiators.

supportingQuotes.text: They know the business, they know our industry, they know what they're doing.
She understands the healthcare business extremely well and she's really buttoned up on this.

themes.label: Structured and Efficient Processes
themes.description: Promoters appreciate Korn Ferry's structured approach and efficiency in managing the search process.

supportingQuotes.text: Everything went very fast, the finding of the candidates in both role. I also was impressed that it was fast.
It was one of the most seamless processes I've ever been through.

whereFallsShort.name: Where the Experience Falls Short
whereFallsShort.description: This category identifies areas where Korn Ferry's service delivery and client experience have not met expectations, highlighting challenges and opportunities for improvement.

themes.label: Candidate Quality and Sourcing
themes.description: Concerns about the quality and breadth of candidate pools, with some clients feeling that Korn Ferry did not deliver the expected level of candidates.

supportingQuotes.text: They didn't really generate the level of the candidates that we thought they should have.
supportingQuotes.interviewId: Gary Knell, San Diego Zoo Wildlife Alliance

supportingQuotes.text: Some of the people on the shortlist had minimal experience... after five minutes, you knew they just were nowhere near what you wanted.

interviewIds: Gary Knell, San Diego Zoo Wildlife Alliance

themes.label: Communication and Coordination
themes.description: Issues with communication, including late delivery of materials and lack of clear coordination, affecting client confidence and process efficiency.

supportingQuotes.text: The reports would often land an hour or two before the call... you have no hope in hell of getting to it.
Early on, it was a little confusing... several different people... reaching out... we couldn't search for [emails] easily.
supportingQuotes.interviewId: Duffield Ashmead IV, Wadsworth Atheneum Museum of Art

interviewIds: Duffield Ashmead IV, Wadsworth Atheneum Museum of Art

themes.label: Diversity and Inclusion in Candidate Slates
themes.description: Clients expressed dissatisfaction with the lack of gender diversity in candidate shortlists, requiring repeated reminders to include female candidates.

supportingQuotes.text: We had to remind the guys a number of times that we want to see women as well as men.

themes.label: Compensation and Offer Management
themes.description: Challenges in obtaining accurate compensation information and managing offer negotiations, leading to delays and potential loss of candidates.

supportingQuotes.text: Trying to get out of them what current comp was, was impossible.
We nearly lost one of the candidates because of it... in the end we didn't actually end up bagging the candidate that we wanted.

themes.label: Client Relationship and Engagement
themes.description: Perceived lack of partnership and respect for client roles, with some clients feeling sidelined or undervalued in the engagement process.

supportingQuotes.text: They're managing up... in a way that felt somewhat disrespectful to me and my role.
